alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:58PM CDT until October 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER AND NORTHEASTERN BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shelby, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Parchman around 435 PM CDT. Rome around 440 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Winstonville, Duncan and Alligator. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
